Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_koel_final_Пора с кое-кем серьёз: It's time to have a serious talk with someone.
dialogs_koel_final_Риом садиться в позу:
Riom sits in the lotus position and dives into the illusory world 
of the Morkret Genome.
dialogs_koel_final_Прости, что так внеза: Sorry for being so sudden\..\..\.. He made me.
dialogs_koel_final_Ладно, давай с начала:
Okay, let's start from the beginning. Why do you think I tried 
so hard to keep you alive?
dialogs_koel_final_Иначе ты бы затерялся:
Otherwise, you would have gotten lost in a place where they
would have been looking for you for a very long time.
dialogs_koel_final_Верно, но это было бы:
True, but that would have been more of an unpleasant 
complication in my life.
dialogs_koel_final_Прости, Риом, но я со:
Sorry, Riom, but I kept you alive for this moment,
to prepare you for meeting my true face.
I don't wear a helmet and armor for beauty or protection.
dialogs_koel_final_Они защищают не меня:
They don't protect me from external threats, but external threats
from me\..\..\.. the real me.
And so, the time has come. You've spent a lot of time with 
Genome, and the darkness has permeated your body well.
dialogs_koel_final_Риом, я сохранил тебе:
Riom, I spared your life to turn you into a vessel,
and then, when I kill your soul and take control of your body,
I will stop being a ghost.
dialogs_koel_final_Сволочь. Значит всё т: Bastard. So all your friendliness is a mask.
dialogs_koel_final_Именно и я готов снят:
I am ready to take it off, but first, please return the favor for our 
first time.
dialogs_koel_final_Тогда ты был безоружн:
Then you were unarmed, but now you are ready to 
fight even a demigod.
dialogs_koel_final_Ух\\..\\..\\.. Наконе: Wow\..\..\.. Finally. Your sword has reached me.
dialogs_koel_final_Прости, Риом. С тобой:
Sorry, Riom. You really were fun. Out of all my owners, you 
were the most interesting.
dialogs_koel_final_Слушай\\..\\..\\.. Ес:
Listen\..\..\.. If someone is controlling you, just say so. I will 
kill him and free you from your shackles, and then promise 
that you will obey me.
Ha-ha-ha\..\..\.. Submit. That's not me. I do what I want, 
with whoever I want, whenever I want.
Try, Riom\..\..\.. to kill me without armor.
dialogs_koel_final_Коельтан замахнулся д: Koeltan swung the hilt of his sword.
dialogs_koel_final_Удар эфесом пришёлся:
The blow with the hilt landed on the center of the forehead. 
The entire helmet was covered in cracks.
\C[10]As if you forgot\..\..\.. The hospital in your head\..\..\.. Fragments 
of memories.
\C[10]Pfft, you're insulting me\..\..\.. I am Koeltan!
dialogs_koel_final_Значит это ты убил вс: So it was you who killed all your owners.
dialogs_koel_final_А то! Убил, сожрал, н:
\C[10]Of course! Killed, ate, tore into pieces. Anything, but not what 
is needed.
dialogs_koel_final_С тобой разговор полу: \C[10]It will be a better conversation with you.
dialogs_koel_final_Ты бы слышал как они:
\C[10]You should have heard them whine\..\..\.. I cut off one of his 
arms and legs and made him crawl through the swamp 
with a sword in his ass. He didn't suffer for long, all the blood 
drained out in a couple of hours. A funny sight.
dialogs_koel_final_А другая оказалась де:
\C[10]And the other one turned out to be a girl\..\..\.. M-m-m-m-m-m! 
I broke all her bones, skinned her, gutted her like a pig and 
devoured her insides in front of her eyes, and fed the rest to 
my eight-legged friends.
dialogs_koel_final_Будто ты лапочка-анге:
\C[10]As if you were a sweetheart angel. You killed a bunch of 
people and now you're pretending to be innocent and peaceful.
dialogs_koel_final_Из рта Даркуса вывали: Several spiders fell out of Darkus' mouth.
\C[10]Okay. Time to get down to business.
dialogs_koel_final_Зачем тебе это? Убьеш: Why do you need this? You'll kill me and then what?
dialogs_koel_final_Ну, раз ты все равно:
\C[10]Well, since you're a corpse anyway\..\..\.. So be it. I'll 
enlighten you one last time.
dialogs_koel_final_Мы, Проклятые, собира:
\C[10]We, the Damned, are going to light the flames of change 
throughout the world. Not just the Dead.
dialogs_koel_final_Думаю, ты уже слышал:
\C[10]I guess you've heard about the Second Cataclysm and 
why everyone gets so scared when it's mentioned.
dialogs_koel_final_Я не последняя фигура:
\C[10]I am not the last figure in the ranks of my freaks. I am 
far from being a judge, but I do not need to be compared 
with a trifle. Therefore, they are eagerly awaiting me 
in the Astral world.
dialogs_koel_final_Как только армия Прок:
\C[10]Once the army of the Damned gathers everyone like me, 
you all will be\..\..\..
dialogs_koel_final_Думаешь, ты круче мен: \C[10]You think you're cooler than me?! Yeah, bastard?!
dialogs_koel_final_Неважно кто перед мно:
\C[10]It doesn't matter who's in front of me, it doesn't matter 
how many of you there are.
dialogs_koel_final_Даркус вонзил меч в з:
Darkus thrust his sword into the ground, took a low 
starting stance, and slightly bent his head.
dialogs_koel_final_Демоны, ангелы, жнецы:
\C[10]Demons, angels, reapers, people, guardians, demigods, 
Creators of everything, devastators, obscurantists of the 
world of the Dead\..\..\..
dialogs_koel_final_Я ВАС, МУДАКОВ, ВСЕХ: \C[10]I'll fucking kill you all, you motherfuckers.
dialogs_koel_final_ФОРМА ВЫСВОБОЖДЕНИЯ!: \C[10]Release of the Form! Furious executioner, Darkus Morde!!
dialogs_koel_final_Добегался, жнец. То ч:
\C[10]You've run yourself ragged, reaper. What you see 
now is the best that Genome Morkret can offer.
dialogs_koel_final_Даркус\\..\\..\\.. Я: Darkus\..\..\.. I've heard it so often\..\..\..
dialogs_koel_final_Пока я продолжаю боро:
As long as I keep fighting, it will be the end for anyone\..\..\.. 
but not for me.
dialogs_koel_final_Значит я буду кромсат:
\C[10]Then I will cut you until you give in.
Believe me already.
dialogs_koel_final_Времени у меня - цела:
\C[10]I have all the time in the world. And your will to fight is 
not infinite.
dialogs_koel_final_Так я теперь выгляжу\: This is how I look now\..\..\.. Where is he? The spider?
dialogs_koel_final_Я его одолел. Наверня:
I defeated him. He's probably shaking in terror 
somewhere in the bushes now.
dialogs_koel_final_Прости меня. Я не хот:
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to, when Krieger hurt you and 
you couldn't move, it was\..\..\.. his doing.
dialogs_koel_final_Я действительно хотел:
I really wanted to help, but when I was about to act, 
I blacked out and could only watch.
\C[10]Koeltan\..\..\.. A pathetic shadow of the past. Riom\..\..\.. 
My prey\..\..\.. I will devour you, become one whole, and 
then walk through Purgatory\..\..\.. I will check how much 
Death has recovered from last time.
dialogs_koel_final_Риом\\..\\..\\.. Что: Riom\..\..\.. What did you say to Adamant's offer?\..\..
dialogs_koel_final_Риом с Коельтаном пок: Riom and Koeltan show the middle finger to Darkus.
dialogs_koel_final_Два Генома Моркрета в: Two Morkret Genomes hit Darkus right in the head.
dialogs_koel_final_Нет, но пока что нас:
No, but he won't bother us for now. He's a part of 
me and he won't disappear completely.
dialogs_koel_final_Слушай\\..\\..\\.. Зн:
Listen\..\..\.. I know a lot has happened. I'm ready to 
forgive you, but on one condition. At least help save 
Purgatory from the Risen.
dialogs_koel_final_После всего, я лучше: After all, I'd rather obey you than him\..\..\..
dialogs_koel_final_Коельтан протянул Рио: Koeltan extended his hand to Riom.
dialogs_koel_final_И это всё?\\..\\.. Ка: And that's all?\..\.. What a pity.
